com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.sale.support

类 ChanceOfEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.gamespec.sale.support.ChanceOfEntry

  • public class ChanceOfEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    A entry may have multiple chances to win prize, for example a entry '1,2,3,4,5,6,7' of LOTTO game 6/29 will have 7 chance to win a prize. This class will represent a chance of a given entry.
